attributes.action: Global warming and waste of resources
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That the cause of global warming be conclusivly scientifically proved befor the goverment spends billions trying to cure somthing that at this point in time is not proved to be the result of human creation.

rejection.details: The title must be a call to action, not a statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
